verses.text: Manhxo jantacoc ix in tzalaj yet' heb' ix alan t'ayin icha tik: Conh t'a stemplo Jehová, xchi heb'.
Axo ticnaik ay onhxo ek' t'a yol chonhab' Jerusalén tik.
Ha Jerusalén, junnhej chonhab'il yaj sb'oi.
Ha t'a jun chonhab' tik sja junjun macanhil heb' schonhab' Jehová, yic wach' sb'itaj icha yutejnac yalancan t'a heb' ko mam quicham.
Ha t'a jun chonhab' tik ay juntzanh despacho b'aj sch'olb'itaj heb' anima yuj yinhtilal winhaj Dawid t'a stojolal.
k'anec to syak' junk'olal Dios t'a Jerusalén. Junk'olalocab' yaj heb' xajanan jun chonhab' tik.
Ayokab' junk'olal t'a yol smuroal yet' t'a yol spat sreyal jun chonhab' tik, xe chi.
Yuj swach'iloc heb' in k'ab' woc yet' heb' wetchonhab', yuj chi' swala': Ayokab' junk'olal, xin chi.
Yujto xajan scajnub' Jehová ko Diosal wuuj, yuj chi' ol wak' wip in sayanek' tas tz'och swach'iloc Jerusalén tik.
